Uses of Interface
md.AtomList

  • Packages that use AtomList 
    Package Description
    md
    Provides the classes to manage the information of MD system (residue, segment, box).

    • Uses of AtomList in md

      Classes in md that implement AtomList 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  Residue
      Stores the information of residue
      class  Segment
      Stores the information of segment
      class  SystemMD
      Stores the information of the whole system
      Methods in md with parameters of type AtomList 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      double RMSD.calc(AtomList sys)
      Calculates RMSD for a given structure.
      double RMSD.calc(int[] atomlist, AtomList sys)
      Calculates RMSD for a given structure.
      double RMSD.calc(java.lang.Integer[] atomlist, AtomList sys)
      Calculates RMSD for a given structure.
      double[] MDUtil.getCenterOfMass(AtomList atoms)
      Returns the center of mass
      void RMSD.orient(AtomList atomlist) 
      void MDUtil.reNumberAtom(int nn, AtomList atoms)
      Renumber the ID of atom starting from a given number
      void RMSD.setReference(AtomList atoms)
      Sets the reference to all atoms in a system
      void RMSD.setReference(int[] atomlist, AtomList sys)
      Sets the reference to selected atoms in a system
      void RMSD.setReference(java.lang.Integer[] atomlist, AtomList sys)
      Sets the reference to selected atoms in a system
      void MDUtil.shift(double[] vector, AtomList atoms)
      Shift the position of the atom by an input vector for a given AtomList holder
      void MDUtil.shiftToPBCImage(AtomList atoms)
      Shifts the current residue to a mirror image to the current box.
      void MDUtil.shiftToPBCImage(double[] position, AtomList atoms)
      Shifts the current residue to a mirror image closest to an input position.
